## BaseSetupInfo type

The base SetupInfo provided to all mock setup functions and triggers.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type BaseSetupInfo = {
    variables: Record<string, VariableValue>;
};
```

## Remarks

All SetupInfo objects extend this type
